'''Festive Tour Ticket''' is an event currency for the [[Invitation of Windblume]] event. They can be earned by completing [[Invitation of Windblume/Festive Challenges|Festive Challenges]] and can be spent in the [[Invitation of Windblume#Festive Tour Ticket|Event Shop]] for valuable rewards.
